item.title: Measuring Goal-Directedness
item.description: New metric, Maximum Entropy Goal-Directedness (MEG), quantifies AI goal-directedness, crucial for assessing AI safety and agency.

item.title: Towards Universal Mesh Movement Networks
item.description: Universal Mesh Movement Network (UM2N) revolutionizes mesh movement for PDE solvers, enabling zero-shot adaptation to diverse problems and significantly accelerating simulations with improved accuracy…
